Pre-Game Insights: Rigobert Song leads Cameroon in search of their sixth continental crown.
Cameroon aims for three points against Guinea in their opening Group C match.
Guinea has fallen short of winning a championship but reached the quarter-finals in the 2021 edition.
The match promises to be an action-packed affair in Yamoussoukro.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is set to take place at Yamoussoukro’s Stade Charles Konan Banny.
Cameroon last won the tournament in 2017 under coach Hugo Broos.
Cameroon will be hoping Côte d'Ivoire brings a lucky charm to their search for an elusive sixth title.
